title: Happy Birthday, Shizuku!
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Happy birthday, Shizuku.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you, Umi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Here’s a present from me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Waaah, can I open it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Of course.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>....Ah, is this what you wear for archery?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Yes. I’m sorry, but it’s secondhand from me. But you said you wanted to learn how to conduct yourself in this kind of clothing before. While kimono fall into the same clothing style, hakama also do. And I think hakama often appear as theatrical costumes. So I thought you could get some practice with it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Thank you so much, Umi-san! I’m so happy! But can I ask one more thing....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I want you to teach me how to behave in a hakama. I want to learn from you, Umi-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
